entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS Collectionview jitters / scrollskips on iPhone 14 simulators / devices (even in .NET 8) #16877
  • BlazorWebView - Mouse Events not being triggered in Android #16875
  • Cannot add Mica backdrop to Maui Blazor hybrid app #16874
  • Radio buttons work correctly with Windows, but they do not work at all with Android. #16873

Closed

  • .net 8 preview 4 HotRestart prevents launching iOS app #15564
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • A #16866
  • Windows Picker TextColor on PointerOver has no effect #16751
    Under Consideration

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into net8.0 #16876
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16872
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Correct minor Barometer API docs mistake #16853
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16379
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Add note about ClipsToBounds/IsClippedToBounds #16833
    area/docs 📓
  • [windows] Fix Picker PointerOver TextColor (#16751) #16752
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker, Under Consideration

Updated

  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [build] Manage extensions via maestro #16834
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃
